# 7.0 Docs

## Cryptography

- [Dynamic X509ChainPolicy verification time](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/7.0/x509chainpolicy-verification-time.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in cryptography where the X509ChainPolicy verification time is the time when Build is invoked.
- [EnvelopedCms.Decrypt doesn't double unwrap](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/7.0/decrypt-envelopedcms.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in cryptography where decrypting EnvelopedCms no longer removes extra data that was introduced by a bug in .NET Core 2.0.
- [X500DistinguishedName parsing of friendly names](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/7.0/x500-distinguished-names.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in cryptography where X500DistinguishedName parsing doesn't permit friendly names where OIDs are expected on MacOS and Linux.
